remarks: Associative law for inner product.  Equation I2 of [Ponnusamy] p. 363. (Contributed by NM, 25-Aug-2007.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
ip1i.1 $e |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) $.
ip1i.2 $e |- G = ( +v ` U ) $.
ip1i.4 $e |- S = ( .sOLD ` U ) $.
ip1i.7 $e |- P = ( .iOLD ` U ) $.
ip1i.9 $e |- U e. CPreHilOLD $.
ipassi $p |- ( ( A e. CC /\ B e. X /\ C e. X ) -> ( ( A S B ) P C ) = ( A x. ( B P C ) ) ) $.
